message: Oh thank the Saints! An oasis! We can finally rest and—
What do you mean [jitter]no[/jitter]? It's right there! Water, shade, probably some nice cool—
We rest when the mission's done. Not before.
But I can barely feel my wings! And you've been marching in full armor for [slow factor=0.5]hours[/slow]!
I've marched for days in worse. The Hellrift won't close itself because we're [slow factor=0.3]tired[/slow].
You know what? You're the most stubborn person I've ever met!
Good. Stubbornness keeps you alive when everything else fails. *continues walking* Now stop whining and keep up.
*sighs* This is going to be a [jitter]long[/jitter] partnership...
